caption_text:
🔥 @ecstaticdancekw X @chocolate_groove collab & a Fresh Mix is LIVE 🔥

Excited to be bringing my magic to this Epic collab under the Leo Full Moon Glow & just released my first Ecstatic Dance Mix in Months!!! A live recording from the Ecstatic Dance in KW recorded live in May!

Titled 🔥 Wild Love.. this is one of my favourite journeys and is really a recap of all my favourite tracks from 2024!

Drop a ‘ME’ or find me on SoundCloud to listen 🔥

Gather your heart, your courage, your radiance — and your people — for an unforgettable night of embodied movement, sacred cacao, and deep community connection. 🌕💃🏽🍫

✨ Leo Full Moon Ecstatic Dance Party & Cacao Ceremony
📅 Fri, Jan 30
🕖 7:00 PM – 11:59 PM
📍 Conrad Centre for the Performing Arts — Kitchener, ON
🎟️ @ecstaticdancekw 

Expect:
🔥 Opening body-activation workshop
🍫 Intentional cacao ceremony to open your heart
🎶 3+ hrs of ecstatic dance with three amazing DJs
🎨 Live art & community vibes
🛌 A grounding closing soundbath
💧 Alcohol-free + embodied, inclusive space for all ✨ ￼

Whether you’re coming solo or with friends — come move, feel, release, and celebrate your wild aliveness under this powerful Leo Full Moon. 🌕🦁
